articles.author: Andrea Blanco
articles.title: Woman claiming to be $1bn Powerball winner seen screaming and running from Skid Row store that sold the ticket - The Independent
articles.description: ‘I can’t even ... I can’t,’ the unidentified woman said as she fought tears of joy. ‘I’m scared right now, I’m so scared’
articles.content:
